prompt: Build me a pomodoro timer with dark mode

react-tailwind.summary: Best overall with settings modal, excellent component architecture, and proper React patterns.

svelte-css.summary: Excellent performance with reactive stores, but all logic in single component without customization.

vue-tailwind.summary: Clean Composition API usage with creative emoji visualization, missing settings customization.

vanilla-html-css-js.summary: Zero dependencies with keyboard shortcuts and notifications, but no component structure.

verdict: React + Tailwind wins with the most complete feature set including user-customizable settings, best code organization through hooks and contexts, and production-ready patterns. While Vanilla JS offers superior performance, React provides the best balance for maintainability and extensibility.
